directions: In a large bowl, mix together peanut butter, cream cheese and sugar. Then stir whipped topping into peanut butter mixture. Whisk until smooth and no lumps remain.
Pour filling into pie crust and refrigerate for about 3 hours until pie is firm.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
1 (9 inch) prepared chocolate cookie crumb crust
title: Smooth and Creamy Peanut Butter Pie
